legacies.label: The Aspirant
legacies.startdescription:
Alone in this chilly city, with my useless education, and my dreams.
What now? Could I become something more?

legacies.label: The Detective
legacies.description: I am an Inspector in the capital's police, charged with the investigation of the most vile and wretched things that one human does to another.
legacies.startdescription: I have ended the careers of thieves, murderers, blackmailers, arsonists. Some criminals do worse still; and on some mornings, my hands have been known to tremble.

legacies.label: The Bright Young Thing
legacies.description: Endowed from birth with wealth and talent. A life of ease, comfort and delight stretches ahead like an amber carpet.
legacies.startdescription: I missed the dawn. I generally do. There'll be plenty more.

legacies.label: The Physician
legacies.description: As the patient descended into the final delirium, I made copious notes. In the buzzing heat of the night, I re-read those notes, and they began, at last, to make a kind of sense.
legacies.startdescription: Today is the day I return to my post at the Institute. I have a position, and a reputation. That should mean something; but I am beginning to dream of something else.

legacies.label: The Detective
legacies.description: I am an Inspector in the capital's police, charged with the investigation of the most vile and wretched things that one human does to another.
legacies.startdescription: I have ended the careers of thieves, murderers, blackmailers, arsonists. Some criminals do worse still; and on some mornings, my hands have been known to tremble.

legacies.label: Apostle Aestuant
legacies.startdescription: The one who shaped us has ascended to a higher state... in one history, at least. The past is uncertain. But I will tend the crucible for their next ascension.
legacies.description: Our Great Shaper is grown powerful - and they have powerful enemies. They will remain in hiding, while I serve as their instrument.

legacies.label: Apostle Obsonate
legacies.startdescription: The one who nourished us has ascended to a higher state... in one history, at least. The past is uncertain. But I will prepare the feast for their next ascension.
legacies.description: Our Delight is grown powerful - and they have powerful enemies. They will remain in hiding, while I serve as their vessel.

legacies.label: Apostle Entheate
legacies.startdescription: The Illuminated One waits in the House of the Sun - waits to rise higher. I am their hand.
legacies.description: I don't remember what happened. I don't remember who I am. But the dreams have taught me what I must do.

legacies.label: Apostle Aestuant
legacies.startdescription: The one who shaped us has ascended to a higher state... in one history, at least. The past is uncertain. But I will tend the crucible for their next ascension.
legacies.description: Our Great Shaper is grown powerful - and they have powerful enemies. They will remain in hiding, while I serve as their instrument.

legacies.label: Apostle Obsonate
legacies.startdescription: The one who nourished us has ascended to a higher state... in one history, at least. The past is uncertain. But I will prepare the feast for their next ascension.
legacies.description: Our Delight is grown powerful - and they have powerful enemies. They will remain in hiding, while I serve as their vessel.

legacies.label: Apostle Entheate
legacies.startdescription: The Illuminated One waits in the House of the Sun - waits to rise higher. I am their hand.
legacies.description: I don't remember what happened. I don't remember who I am. But the dreams have taught me what I must do.

legacies.label: The Survivor
legacies.description: At times, in mirrors, in crowds, you see the face of one now lost.

legacies.label: The Cousin
legacies.description: One morning, when the Sun is high and the mirrors all are sealed, there will come a knock on your door. "A benefactor", the gentleman in grey will say. "A bequest. Perhaps you hadn't known you were related."
